thread.title: Major retailer Dick’s ends sales of assault-style rifles

title: Major retailer Dick’s ends sales of assault-style rifles
text:
Major retailer Dick’s ends sales of assault-style rifles 2:45am IST - 02:06 
Dick’s Sporting Goods said it is ending sales of assault-style rifles and high-capacity magazines in its stores in the strongest signal yet that Corporate America won't stand on the sidelines in the renewed gun control debate.   
Dick’s Sporting Goods said it is ending sales of assault-style rifles and high-capacity magazines in its stores in the strongest signal yet that Corporate America won't stand on the sidelines in the renewed gun control debate.  //reut.rs/2COGWfL
